topic.title: INTERNATIONAL SOCIETY OF PAEDIATRIC ONCOLOGY TUMOUR LOCAL STAGE
topic.shortdesc: The local stage of the Tumour as assessed by a Pathologist using the International Society of Paediatric Oncology (SIOP) classification system during a Children Teenagers and Young Adults Cancer Care Spell.
